title: Big Buck Bunny
description: A giant, friendly rabbit deals with three mischievous squirrels in this classic open-source short film.

title: Elephant's Dream
description: A surreal journey through a mechanical world, exploring the relationship between two characters.

title: Tears of Steel
description: A sci-fi short set in a future Amsterdam where a group of warriors and scientists try to save the world.

title: Shrek
description: An animated film about an ogre named Shrek who embarks on a quest to rescue Princess Fiona.

title: Bee movie
description: An animated comedy about a bee who sues the human race for exploiting bees.
